amendment.description: To increase funding for Title I grants and reduce debt by closing corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3071 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 64.

action.text: Amendment SA 3071 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S2244-2246, S2259; text: CR S2244-2245) To increase funding for Title I grants and reduce debt by closing corporate tax loopholes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3071 proposed by Senator Akaka.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3071 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 64.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3071 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 64.
